pages.text: The lava in old hell remind me the cave spicy hotpot.Although in the cave, you can make the spicy hotpot

First you should add some cured meat, it will have special flavor $(br)Chili pepper is important for the spicy hotpot$(br)salt, spicy and salty!$(br)Add some scallion to make the cuisine beautiful$(br)Spicy hotpot need pressure cooker, it will be delicious when cook a lot of time!

It is hard to find some vegetable in caves, but some explosion monster will drop the scallion. And we can even get the chili pepper when kill them on fire! Use a knife to kill them to get these material!
